verses.name: Romans 3:26
verses.text: To declare, I say, at this time his righteousness: that he might be just, and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus.

verses.name: Romans 3:27
verses.text: Where is boasting then? It is excluded. By what law? of works? Nay: but by the law of faith.

verses.name: Romans 3:28
verses.text: Therefore we conclude that a man is justified by faith without the deeds of the law.

verses.name: Romans 3:29
verses.text: Is he the God of the Jews only? is he not also of the Gentiles? Yes, of the Gentiles also:

verses.name: Romans 3:30
verses.text: Seeing it is one God, which shall justify the circumcision by faith, and uncircumcision through faith.
